name: Dark Night Maze
description:
"Dark Night Maze" is a very challenging maze adventure game, rich maps, many monsters waiting for players to explore, in the game, players will explore in the dark, collect various treasures, fight monsters, in the game, players will experience a variety of challenges, in order to improve their skill level, and finally complete the maze exploration mission, find the exit to win.
There are 4 levels in the game, namely simple levels, normal levels, difficult levels and hell levels, each level has a variety of challenges waiting for players to complete, and the monsters are getting stronger and stronger, the biggest feature of the game is super difficult to clear the level, players need to collect a variety of equipment, treasures, etc., improve their abilities, and finally complete the final mission.
The game has a variety of monsters, each monster has its own characteristics and abilities, players need to develop the most suitable battle strategy according to the monster's ability, and there are several terrible bosses in the game, players need to use their own equipment and abilities to win.
